price: (Mfe tenten a wͻdiiε) de gyee wͻn ani no ho mma mfasoͻ biara mma wͻn.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yumattaʿūna
